biocontainers.name: scalpel
biocontainers.summary: Sensitive detection of indels (insertions and deletions)

biotools.summary: A software package for detecting INDELs (INsertions and DELetions) mutations in a reference genome which has been sequenced with next-generation sequencing technology .

bioschemas.name: Scalpel
bioschemas.summary: A software package for detecting INDELs (INsertions and DELetions) mutations in a reference genome which has been sequenced with next-generation sequencing technology .
